title: SEAFORT INT / BLAST DOOR
description: blast door interactable dialogue. (this is closed, no way to open, open from console if has fuel in)

dialogueTree.title: Small Blast Door: "The heavy metal door stands as it d..."
dialogueTree.text: The heavy metal door stands as it did, firmly rusted shut into its big brother.

links.title: You: "What's on the other side?"
links.text: What's on the other side?

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Another part of the island probabl..."
links.text: "Another part of the island probably." The lieutenant looks into the keyhole. "The lock looks like it could still be usable."

links.title: Cuno: ""Another part of Death Island? Some..."
links.text: "Another part of Death Island? Some secret hidden shit, Cuno thinks. Important shit..."

links.title: Logic: "The chances of there being 'importa..."
links.text: The chances of there being 'important shit' there are rather high, yes.

links.title: Small Blast Door: "The door is mute, cold as ice. The..."
links.text: The door is mute, cold as ice. The lock looks like it may have seen recent use, but it's impossible to tell.

links.title: You: "How do I open this?"
links.text: How do I open this?

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Fuel -- generator -- console. That..."
links.text: "Fuel -- generator -- console. That's our best chance." He points to the console at the other end of the room. "That there could open it, now that the power's on."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Fuel -- generator -- console. That..."
links.text: "Fuel -- generator -- console. That's our best chance." He points to the console at the other end of the room. "That there could open it, once we've put some fuel in the generator."

links.title: Cuno: ""We fuelled the generator, didn't w..."
links.text: "We fuelled the generator, didn't we?" He points to the console at the other end of the room. "What do you think that shit's for? Let's press some buttons."

links.title: Cuno: ""What do you think that shit's for?..."
links.text: "What do you think that shit's for? Let's press some buttons." He points to the console at the other end of the room.

links.title: Small Blast Door: "Fuel --> generator --> console. See..."
links.text: Fuel --> generator --> console. Seems like an obvious path, now that the power is on.

links.title: Small Blast Door: "Fuel --> generator --> console. See..."
links.text: Fuel --> generator --> console. Seems like the obvious path.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Maybe this is one of the doors we..."
links.text: "Maybe this is one of the doors we *don't* open?" He looks at the door, then at its bigger brother, then at the lockâ€¦

links.title: Interfacing: "He's right. It would be better to o..."
links.text: He's right. It would be better to open its *big brother*. A powerful engine hangs under the ceiling -- it must control the blast door.

links.title: You: ""You're right. We open the big one..."
links.text: "You're right. We open the big one -- do you see controls anywhere?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I think there's a console just sou..."
links.text: "I think there's a console just southeast..."  He shuffles his feet to stay warm. "Let's look around. Getting the blast door open seems like the best plan."

links.title: You: ""No, this isn't 'One More Door'. We..."
links.text: "No, this isn't 'One More Door'. We're opening it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""All right." The lieutenant knocks..."
links.text: "All right." The lieutenant knocks on the metal. "I retract my statement. It was naive. Let's look around and get it open."

links.title: You: ""I find us not opening it highly un..."
links.text: "I find us not opening it highly unlikely."

links.title: You: ""Sure, you're right. We won't have..."
links.text: "Sure, you're right. We won't have to open it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant knocks on the metal...."
links.text: The lieutenant knocks on the metal. "I retract my statement. It was naive. Let's look around and get it open."

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno don't know how to pick this l..."
links.text: "Cuno don't know how to pick this lock. This one's... military shit." He looks at the door, then at its bigger brother, then at the lock.

links.title: Interfacing: "He's right. It would be better to o..."
links.text: He's right. It would be better to open its *big brother*. A powerful engine hangs beneath the ceiling -- it must control the blast door.

links.title: You: ""You're right. We open the big one..."
links.text: "You're right. We open the big one -- do you see controls somewhere?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, the console over there?" He..."
links.text: "Yeah, the console over there?" He points to the southeast. "Yeah. Yeah. Let's get this big shit open."

links.title: You: ""No. This is the titular *One More..."
links.text: "No. This is the titular *One More Door*. We're opening it."

links.title: Cuno: ""Fuckin' A, let's get this shit ope..."
links.text: "Fuckin' A, let's get this shit open. Get to the secrets behind. Secret style." He stares at the large doors looming above him.

links.title: You: ""I find that highly unlikely.""
links.text: "I find that highly unlikely."

links.title: You: ""One of the *very few doors*? Perha..."
links.text: "One of the *very few doors*? Perhaps..."

links.title: You: ""Sure, you're right. We won't have..."
links.text: "Sure, you're right. We won't have to open it."

links.title: Small Blast Door: "How indeed? Finding the key seems u..."
links.text: How indeed? Finding the key seems unlikely...

links.title: Interfacing: "Perhaps you could open its *big bro..."
links.text: Perhaps you could open its *big brother*? A powerful engine hangs beneath the ceiling -- it must control the blast door. There must be controls somewhere...

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Small Blast Door: "You see a small metal door nested i..."
dialogueTree.text: You see a small metal door nested inside a larger one -- a heavy steel blast door. There is a conventional keyhole above the handle. It's very small.
